texts.base: Has the same effect as the rune or soul stone currently held by Isaac. The charge time is based on the power of the rune.
Spawns an orbital familiar that blocks enemy shots. Upon taking damage, the familiar will pursue enemies for the rest of the room, dealing 22.5 damage per second.
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and blocks enemy projectiles. Upon blocking a shot, it has a chance of triggering The Necronomicon effect.
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and drips a trail of slow creep, spawning 1-2 Blue Spiders after each room.

name: Robo-Baby 2.0
quote: We worked out all the kinks

texts.base: Spawns a familiar that fires lasers at any enemy in its line of sight and moves based on the direction Isaac is firing tears.
Spawns a familiar that spawns a Blue Fly when Isaac shoots. It can only have one Fly at a time.
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac, leaving blood creep on the ground.
Spawns a leech familiar that chases enemies, dealing ~3 damage per second. Heals a Half Red Heart whenever Leech kills an enemy.
Spawns a familiar that drops a Heart, coin, Bomb, or Key every 5-6 rooms.
Spawns a familiar that flies around the room in a zig-zag pattern and explodes on contact with an enemy. Respawns after ten seconds.
Spawns a familiar that charges forward when shooting tears and explodes upon contact with an enemy, damaging and poisoning them. The familiar respawns after a few seconds.
When hit, spawns a quickly orbiting attack fly similar to Forever Alone for the current room that deals high damage.
Grants a familiar that charges a thin Brimstone laser while Isaac is shooting.
Isaac himself is now immune to all damage, and a heart familiar follows him. If the heart is hurt, Isaac is hurt.
texts.dlc8: The heart charges up as Isaac shoots, firing 8 blood shots, knocking back enemies, and leaving a puddle of creep when released.

texts.base: Spawns a familiar that chases down enemies, dealing 4 damage per second and inflicting fear.

name: Dark Bum
quote: He wants to take your life

texts.base: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and collects Red Hearts. For every 1 Red Hearts collected, Dark Bum will give a reward.
Spawns a large orbital familiar that blocks enemy shots and deals 30 damage per second to enemies.
Spawns a familiar that wanders randomly, occasionally spawning Blue Spiders.
Spawns a Mulligan familiar that wanders randomly. Enemies will attack the Mulligan if it's closer.
Upon use, Isaac jumps in the direction he is currently moving, allowing travel over obstacles and enemies.

texts.dlc7: Combines the effects of D4, The D6, and D20.
texts.dlc8: Combines the effects of D1, D4, The D6, D7, D8, D10, D12, and D20.

texts.base: Rerolls all of Isaac's passive items.

texts.dlc7: Re-rolls all monsters in the room.
texts.dlc8: Replaces all monsters in the room with weaker monsters.

texts.dlc7: Copies the effect of the card or rune currently held by Isaac.
texts.dlc8: Copies the effect of the card currently held by Isaac. The charge time is based on the power of the card.

texts.base: Gives the effect of Treasure Map, The Compass, or Blue Map for the duration of the current floor.
texts.dlc8: If all effects are active, X-Ray Vision is provided for the floor instead. Highlights any Tinted Rocks and rocks with Crawl Space in the room.

texts.dlc7: Spawns 1-4 Blue Spiders that deal 2.5x Isaac's damage to enemies.
texts.dlc8: Spawns 4-8 Blue Spiders that deal 2x Isaac's damage to enemies.

texts.base: Throws out a flame that damages everything in its path, diminishing in size as it hits enemies or blocks shots.
When at full health, up to 4 extra Red Hearts can be stored in The Jar. Activating drops the stored hearts on the ground.
Turns all non-boss monsters in the room into Poop. Instantly kills poop-themed bosses.

name: Satanic Bible
quote: Reusable evil... but at what cost?

texts.base: Gives one Black Heart.
texts.dlc8: Replaces the boss room item on the current floor with a Devil Deal.

texts.dlc2: Fires a powerful Brimstone beam in four cardinal directions, much like Krampus shoots with a 50% chance to rotate all beams around Isaac 90 degrees.
texts.dlc13: Fires a powerful Brimstone beam in four cardinal directions, much like Krampus shoots.

texts.base: Upon use, Isaac farts and knocks back nearby enemies
texts.dlc8: Enemies pushed into walls or obstacles take 12 damage.

texts.base: Uses 1 Penny to deal damage to all enemies in the room.

texts.dlc7: Converts two Soul Hearts or Black Hearts into one filled Red Heart Container.
texts.dlc8: Converts one Soul Heart or Black Heart into one filled Red Heart Container.

texts.base: Upon use, spawns specific pickups or items depending on the floor it is used on. Disappears after use.
Gives invulnerability and increased speed for six seconds, but removes the ability to shoot tears.
-0.3 Speed. Isaac builds speed while in a room with enemies. At max speed, he gains the My Little Unicorn effect for 5 seconds.
+0.25 Speed. Running into enemies while at a high speed will deal damage.
texts.dlc8: Prevents Isaac from taking contact damage while moving at high speed.

texts.base: Adds 3 Soul Hearts. Grants The Wafer effect for the current room after taking damage.
Isaac can destroy rocks by walking into them.
Adds a chance to give a shield that nullifies all incoming damage for 10 seconds upon taking damage. Also converts bad pills into good pills.
Gives 6 Coins, 6 Bombs, and 6 Keys and balances out all attributes.
Grants poison tears, which deal damage over time when inflicted.
Increases speed by +0.2 and grants piercing tears.

texts.dlc7: Adds 1 Red Heart Container, gives +0.5 Damage, +0.1 Speed, +1.5 Range, and -1.0 Tear Delay, and gives 1 Bomb, Penny, and Key.
texts.dlc8: Adds 1 Red Heart Container, gives +0.5 Damage, +0.1 Speed, +0.75 Range, and +0.5 Fire Rate, and gives 1 Bomb, Penny, and Key.

texts.base: A trail of blue creep is left behind Isaac, which damages enemies.
texts.dlc8: The creep inherits most of Isaac's tear effects, like homing, etc.

texts.dlc7: -1 Tear Delay, adds knock-back shots and increases tear size.
texts.dlc8: +0.5 Fire Rate, adds knock-back shots and increases tear size.

name: Eve's Mascara
quote: DMG up, tears + shot speed down

texts.dlc7: Doubles damage, halves tears stat, and greatly reduces shot speed.
texts.dlc8: Doubles damage, 0.66x tears multiplier, and greatly reduces shot speed.

texts.base: Upon death, respawns Isaac as Dark Judas with two Black Hearts in the previous room.
Gives one Red Heart Container and doubles the healing provided by Red Hearts.
texts.dlc8: Also heals 1 Red Heart when obtained.

texts.base: Grants a shield that negates the first instance of damage taken, once per room. Does not apply to or negate self-damage (Blood Donation Machines, etc).

name: Thunder Thighs
quote: HP up + speed down + you feel stompy

texts.base: Destroys rocks upon contact with Isaac. Adds one Red Heart container and lowers Speed.
Pickups, trinkets, and monsters are magnetically attracted to Isaac's tears.
Grants charged tears that can be fired in a tight burst. Getting hit while charging will teleport Isaac to another room.
Tears leave a small, short lasting pool of creep on impact or when their range is depleted.
Spawns a conjoined familiar which chases enemies close to Isaac, dealing ~8 damage per second.

texts.dlc7: Spawns a familiar that slowly floats around the room on a zig-zag pattern and shoots normal tears in the same direction as Isaac.
texts.dlc8: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and fires tears in random cardinal directions that copy Isaac's tears and tear effects and scale with damage.

texts.base: Spawns a controllable familiar that deals 37.5 damage per second on touch. It can be moved using the shooting directional keys
Attaches a ball and chain to Isaac that pulls behind him that damages enemies, blocks shots, and destroys most Obstacles.
Spawns a familiar that copies the tears of Isaac's other familiars.
Fires 8 tears around Isaac, which retain the damage, range, shot speed, and special tear effects of his tears. Each tear shot by Isaac increases item charge by one.
texts.dlc8: Tears from this item have a +5 flat damage bonus.

texts.base: Teleports Isaac to the Secret Room, Super Secret Room, Treasure Room, or I AM ERROR.
Turns Isaac's head into a stationary familiar for the current room which fires tears automatically.
texts.dlc8: Isaac's body also shoots a controllable fountain of blood shots for the room.

texts.base: Grants a brief moment of invincibility when the charge bar hits zero. Isaac begins taking damage if the item is held any longer.
texts.dlc8: Isaac creates beams of light when touching enemies while invulnerable, and creates a powerful 4-way beam if blocking damage exactly as the invincibility starts.

texts.base: If Isaac has half a red heart or no red hearts after taking damage, he gains a shield that nullifies all types of damage for 5 seconds. Allows entrance into Chest.
texts.dlc8: Also allows access to Home.

texts.base: If Isaac has half a red heart or no red hearts after taking damage, all enemies in the room take significant damage. Allows entrance into the Dark Room.
texts.dlc8: +1 Damage and also allows access to Home.

texts.base: Instead of firing tears, Isaac controls one floating tear that hover over obstacles. This tear deals constant damage when held in place over an enemy.
Tears are smaller and do much less damage, but fire in very rapid succession.

texts.dlc7: Grants homing tears with a damaging halo. +0.5 Damage, -0.3 Tears -0.3 Shot Speed, +0.8 Tear Falling Speed, and +1.2 Range.
texts.dlc8: Grants homing tears with a damaging halo. +0.5 Damage, -0.3 Tears, and -0.3 Shot Speed.

texts.dlc7: Upon dying, resurrect as Lazarus Risen in the current room with one Red Heart container and Anemic.
texts.dlc8: Upon dying, resurrect as Lazarus Risen in the current room with one less Red Heart container, Anemic, and +0.5 Damage. Transform into Lazarus when reaching the next floor.

texts.base: Reveals the entire map, including all special rooms and Secret Rooms.
Adds 3 Red Heart Containers.
Grants two Soul Hearts. Isaac gains a pulsing aura that repels enemies and projectiles.
Grants piercing and spectral tears. Increases tear size (without increasing damage) while greatly reducing range and shot speed.
Every 4th newly discovered room entered will slow down or speed up every enemy and their attacks. The chance to slow enemies is quite higher than the chance to speed them up.
Throws a boomerang which retrieves pickups, as well as damages and petrifies enemies hit for 2 seconds.

texts.dlc7: Grants one Black Heart, +5.25 range, +0.5 tear falling speed, +0.16 shot speed.
texts.dlc8: Grants one Black Heart, +2.5 range, +0.16 shot speed.

texts.base: Grants +0.3 speed, reduces character size, and gives a random pill.
+0.7 tears, +0.16 shot speed.

name: Blue Cap
quote: HP + tears up + shot speed down

texts.base: Gives one full Red Heart container, +0.7 tears, and -0.16 shot speed.
texts.dlc8: Heals 1 additional Red Heart.

texts.base: Grants 1 Soul Heart and +1 luck. Spawns 2 Keys.
Grants Isaac one Black Heart, spawns two or three Bombs.

texts.dlc7: +1 damage, +5.25 range, +0.5 tear falling speed.
texts.dlc8: +1 damage, +2.5 range.

texts.base: Grants one full Red Heart container.
texts.dlc8: Heals 1 additional Red Heart.

texts.base: Duplicates all pickups and item pedestals in the room.
Has the same effect as the Pill currently held by Isaac.
texts.dlc8: The charge time is based on the power of the pill.

texts.base: When used, has a 50% chance to drop a random coin.
Upon entering a room, poisons all enemies, dealing double Isaac's tear damage. Killing enemies leaves a small, short-lasting pool of green creep on the ground.
Petrifies all enemies in the current room for about 1.5 seconds, poisons any enemies near Isaac, and sends a rock wave across the room in the direction Isaac is facing.

texts.dlc7: Fires a high-damage piercing spectral tear, but lowers Isaac's health to half a heart.
texts.dlc8: Fires a high-damage piercing spectral tear. If Isaac takes damage while holding this, he takes extra damage and it becomes Broken Glass Cannon.

texts.base: +5 Bombs. Isaac's bombs will now explode in a large cross-shaped pattern (roughly 5 bombs explosions wide). This also affects player-spawned Troll Bombs.

name: Crack Jacks
quote: HP up. Don't swallow the prize!

texts.base: Grants one full Red Heart container and drops a random trinket.

texts.dlc7: +1.25 range, +0.5 tear falling speed, +1 luck.
texts.dlc8: +2.5 range, +1 luck. Grants one Soul Heart.

texts.base: Causes Isaac's activated item to activate twice on each use.
Duplicates all of Isaac's familiars for the current room. If Isaac has no familiars, spawns a Demon Baby for the room instead.
Grants spectral tears. Tears simultaneously fire out of both eyes diagonally, similar to the effect of the R U a Wizard? pill.
+1.5 damage. Replaces Isaac's tears with nails, which have increased knockback.
Spawns a demonic familiar that shoots tears identical to Isaac's in terms of damage, tears, and tear effects.
A blue head familiar that will follow Isaac and fire tears copying his tear effects and damage.
Spawns a chest familiar that spawns a random pickup (25% chance) or trinket (10% chance) upon clearing a room.
Spawns an orbital familiar which does 105 damage per second and attracts and blocks enemy shots. Upon blocking 10 shots in a room, it drops an Eternal Heart.
Spawns a white attack fly that orbits somewhere between Distant Admiration and Forever Alone, dealing 45 damage per second.

texts.dlc7: Spawns fly familiar that moves in a straight line and circles around the first wall or obstacle it hits, dealing 105 damage per second on contact.
texts.dlc8: Spawns fly familiar that moves in a straight line and circles around the first wall or obstacle it hits, dealing 56 damage per second and forcing nearby enemies to attack it.

name: Scatter Bombs
quote: We put bombs in your bombs!

texts.base: +5 Bombs. Isaac's bombs explode into 2-4 tiny bombs.
+5 Bombs. Bombs stick to enemies and spawn 2-4 Blue Spiders if they kill an enemy.
texts.dlc8: They also leave a long-lasting puddle of slowing white creep.

texts.base: Shooting in one direction increases Isaac's rate of fire until the cap is reached. As soon as Isaac changes direction or stops shooting, rate of fire is reset to its normal amount.
Grants spectral tears and increases range. Tears travel through walls and appear at the opposite side of the room.

texts.dlc7: +0.7 tears, +5.25 range, +0.5 tear falling speed, Spawns a combination of 3 Red Hearts, Soul Hearts or Black Hearts on the floor when picked up.
texts.dlc8: +0.7 tears, +2.5 range, spawns 3 random types of Hearts on the floor when picked up.

texts.base: Upon taking damage, spawns six Troll Bombs around the room, similar to the effect of XVI - The Tower.
Spawns a familiar that occasionally drops a Lil' Battery, gives an active item charge, or petrifies all enemies in the room.
Isaac's damage increases each time an enemy is hit. Damage is reset upon missing a shot.
Adds a chance to fire holy tears, which will create a damaging light beam in the area if they hit an enemy.
A host familiar that sits on Isaac's head and has a random chance to block enemy shots and retaliate with 3 tears. Grants immunity to explosions.
Causes Shops to instantly restock their items when they are bought.
texts.dlc8: Outside of Greed Mode, the restocked item's cost is increased after each purchase.

texts.base: Spider enemies no longer target or deal contact damage to Isaac.
Continuously firing tears for three seconds causes Isaac to drop a Butt Bomb, which damages and confuses all enemies in the room when it explodes.
Gives Isaac spectral tears and gives his tears a wide arc shape, increasing their size.

texts.dlc7: +5 Coins. Most doors require one Penny to open instead of a Key.
texts.dlc8: +5 Coins. All locked doors, Locked Chests, and Key Blocks must be opened with one Penny instead of Keys.

name: Eden's Blessing
quote: Tears up + your future shines brighter

texts.base: +0.7 tears up. Grants a random item at the start of the next run.
Throwing the ball at a monster instantly kills and captures it. The captured enemy can later be released and will be friendly, fighting for Isaac and persisting between rooms.
Splits all of Isaac's tears that are currently in the air into 6 tears that fire in all directions, which retain their damage and shot speed.
A Gurdy Jr. familiar that charges up while Isaac is firing, bouncing around the room when released and dealing contact damage based on its speed.

Spawns a beggar familiar which picks up any nearby coins, leveling up after collecting several coins. At level 2, Bumbo gains a body. At level 3, it begins to fire tears. At level 4, Bumbo follows enemies and gains contact damage.

texts.dlc7: Re-rolls all Rocks and Metal Blocks in the current room into other random obstacles.
texts.dlc8: Re-rolls most types of Obstacles in the current room into other random obstacles.

texts.base: Spawns a familiar which creates a circular aura that slows down enemies and enemy shots inside.
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and collects Keys for himself, giving random Chests in return.
Spawns a familiar that drops a random rune after clearing enough rooms.
Spawns an angel familiar who follows Isaac and fires homing tears which deal 10 damage and have 75% shot speed.

texts.dlc7: Charms all enemies in the room when Isaac takes damage.
texts.dlc8: Enemies are able to damage each other. If an enemy is damaged by another enemy, they will attack that enemy instead of Isaac.

texts.base: Gives Isaac a random zodiac item effect that changes every floor.
Tears have a chance to apply a poison effect to enemies. Isaac poisons enemies on contact. Poisoned enemies have a chance to drop a Black Heart when killed.
Isaac will automatically fire tears directed at a red target on the ground. The target can be moved with tear controls. +0.7 tears, increases range.
Tears are replaced with laser rings that pierce through enemies and deal damage to enemies within them. Can be charged to increase the effectiveness of the ring.
Creates up to two portals that remain even if Isaac leaves the room. Upon entering a portal, Isaac is teleported to the other portal.
Isaac emits a beam from his face that his tears are bound to.
texts.dlc7: Increases Tears, Range, and Shot Speed.
texts.dlc8: Increases Fire Rate, Range, and Shot Speed.

texts.base: Tears have a chance to shrink enemies, making them run away from Isaac. Shrunk enemies can be crushed and killed by walking over them.
Charged by firing for 2.5 seconds and when released, creates a black ring around Isaac that rapidly deals damage.
texts.dlc7: +1 damage, the ring can cause enemies to drop Black Hearts.

texts.base: In addition to tears, Isaac holds a spear in front of him which deals contact damage equal to 2x his tear damage, and occasionally inflicts fear.
Isaac's tears have a chance to stick to enemies and explode.
Drops 1-6 random pickups on the floor. Causes items to be chosen from random item pools.

Displays Isaac's tear damage and enemy health bars. Spawns a familiar that wanders around and inflicts random status effects on enemies it touches. Can spawn a Lil' Battery/Blue spider upon clearing a room.
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and blocks enemy shots. If a shot hits Farting Baby, it has a chance to fart, which charms, poisons, or knocks back nearby enemies.

texts.dlc7: Spawns a familiar that bounces diagonally around the room, applying a random status effect to enemies it hits and has a chance to re-roll pickups it passes over.
texts.dlc8: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac. Double tapping the fire button launches it forward, causing it to reroll the first monster or pickup it hits.

texts.base: Re-rolls Isaac's damage, tears, range, and speed.

Boosts one of Isaac's stats depending on the color of the aura around him. The aura disappears upon taking damage and reappears with a random color upon entering a new room. Red boosts damage, blue boosts tears, yellow boosts speed, and orange boosts range.

texts.dlc7: When Isaac takes damage, a damaging black ring briefly appears around him. This ring can cause enemies to drop Black Hearts.
texts.dlc8: After Isaac kills an enemy, adds a luck-based chance to spawn a damaging black ring around them.

texts.base: Grants two Black Hearts. While Isaac has no red hearts, grants flight and periodically grants an invincibility shield for a few seconds.
Adds a chance to fire a slow-moving eye that fires tears in the same direction as Isaac. The eye is destroyed when it hits an enemy or obstacle.
Isaac's damage increases for the current room each time he kills an enemy.
After taking damage a certain amount of times, a permanent demonic familiar spawns.
Upon picking up a certain amount of health, spawn a permanent angelic familiar.
Two item pedestals are presented in every Treasure Room. Only one can be taken; the other will disappear.
+2 Soul Hearts. While Isaac has no empty red hearts, grants 2x damage, increased range, and -0.3 shot speed. Regardless of health, the crown deactivates for the current room when Isaac takes damage.

texts.dlc7: Allows Isaac to carry two cards or pills (or a combination of both) at the same time.
texts.dlc8: Increases the coin cap to 999. If a room would otherwise yield no reward, 1-3 coins will spawn.

texts.base: Spawns a flying familiar that bounces around the room with a black aura, dealing rapid damage to any enemies inside it. While standing in the aura, Isaac gains a 1.5x tear damage multiplier.
Isaac's tears gain a random effect that changes every shot.
Teleports Isaac to a room that has not been explored yet. Normal rooms are prioritized over special rooms, and common special rooms take priority over rarer ones.
Isaac leaves a trail of black powder on the floor. Walking in a circle will spawn a pentagram symbol on the floor, which deals 10 damage per tick to any enemies inside it.
Isaac farts, charming all nearby enemies.
Rewinds time, putting Isaac back in the previous room and undoing anything that happened in the current room.
texts.dlc8: Can only be used three times per floor, after which it functions like The Hourglass until the next floor.

texts.base: Surrounds Isaac with a large white halo that occasionally deals Isaac's tear damage to enemies inside it, and can convert enemy shots into friendly homing tears.
Spawns a Grab Bag on pickup. Coins, Bombs, Keys, cards, runes and batteries have a chance to become Grab Bags.
A cone of light shines in the direction Isaac is moving that slows enemies and enemy shots.
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac's movements on a delay and deals 30 contact damage per second to enemies.
Places a Movable TNT barrel that can be pushed and used to destroy rocks or damage enemies. If used again in the same room while the previous TNT barrel is still intact, remotely detonates the TNT.
Grants 4 Soul Hearts and fully restores Isaac's health.
Isaac's tears become coins and now have a chance to drop Pennies on the floor upon successfully hitting an enemy.
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac's movements on a 3 second delay, firing tears at nearby enemies.
Spawns a familiar that will follow Isaac's movements on a 2.5-second delay. Tears that pass through the baby will be doubled and increase in speed.
+5 Bombs. Bombs have a chance to drop random pickups or charm enemies when they explode.

texts.dlc7: Inflicts fear on all enemies in the room upon taking damage and spawns black friendly Chargers that attack enemies.
texts.dlc8: Spawns a shadow familiar that closely follows behind Isaac. It spawns a black friendly Charger whenever an enemy touches it.

texts.base: Killing an enemy adds a fly to the jar, up to a maximum of 20. On use, releases Blue Flies equal to the number of flies in the jar.
Spawns a Loki familiar that follows Isaac and fires 4 tears in a cross pattern.
Spawns a glass familiar that spills on the floor upon taking damage.
texts.dlc7: After the milk spills, Isaac's tear delay is decreased by 2 for the current room.
texts.dlc8: After the milk spills, Isaac's fire rate is increased by 1 for the current room.

texts.base: Restarts the current room and brings back all enemies, allowing more rewards to be acquired by completing the room.
Grants one Soul Heart, +0.75 tears and decreases Isaac's size.
Increases luck by 1 and doubles the effects of trinkets while held. When used, drops a random trinket on the ground.

Randomly while firing tears, Isaac will stop firing and turn red, where he will charge and release a lot of 'tears' in one go. The burst of tears also includes a kidney stone, which deals a lot of damage.

Upon use, Isaac fires a laser similar to the one used by Mega Satan. This laser deals massive damage, lasts for approximately 15 seconds, and persists between rooms. Isaac is pushed backwards by the force of the laser while it is active.

texts.dlc7: When at exactly one Red Heart, increases tears, range, tear falling speed, and shot speed.
texts.dlc8: When at exactly one Red Heart, increases fire rate, range, and shot speed.

texts.base: +0.3 tears. Adds a chance to fire a razor blade that deals 4x Isaac's damage.
After every 15 tears fired, Isaac will fire a high-damage cluster of tears.
+0.3 damage, +0.1 speed. Plays a howl or bark sound when entering a room with undiscovered Secret Rooms or Crawl Spaces.
While firing, Isaac gains a green aura that poisons nearby enemies.
Constantly shooting causes Isaac to release gas clouds that can be pushed by his tears and damage nearby enemies.

texts.dlc7: Upon taking damage, Isaac has a chance to drop a full red heart, gain 5 range, and leave a trail of damaging red creep for the current room.
texts.dlc8: Taking damage causes Isaac to bleed, spraying a volley of blood in the direction he fires. Bleeding will eventually damage him, but it can be stopped by picking up a Red Heart.

texts.base: Grants one Soul Heart. Enemy shots have a chance to be reflected at the shooter as confusing tears.
Every 20 tears, Isaac loses 1 Penny and shoots an additional gold tear that petrifies enemies and turns them into gold. Any enemy killed while in this state will drop coins.
Drops a random card or rune.
texts.dlc7: Doubles the effects of most cards and runes.
texts.dlc8: Doubles the effects of tarot cards.

texts.base: Taking damage releases a ring of 10 high damage tears.
Increases Range. Tears turn into bones, which shatter into 1-3 bone shards upon hitting an enemy or obstacle.
Allows Isaac to carry two cards, pills, or any combination of both. Spawns one random card, rune, or pill.

texts.dlc7: +1.5 range, +1 tear falling speed. Drops a Lucky Penny.
texts.dlc8: +2.5 range. Drops a Lucky Penny.

texts.base: Grants one full Red Heart container.
texts.dlc8: Heals 1 additional Red Heart.

texts.base: Grants a Soul Heart. Gives Isaac a chance to ignore any damage taken.
Drops a random trinket. Grants a second trinket slot.
Adds a chance to fire a booger that sticks to enemies and deals damage over time.
Adds a chance to shoot tears that confuse enemies for an extremely long time.
Adds a chance to fire an egg sack which creates slowing creep and spawns a Blue Fly or Blue Spider upon hitting an enemy.
Grants piercing tears. After piercing one enemy, tears start homing and deal double damage.
+0.3 damage. Adds a chance to fire acidic tears which can destroy obstacles and open doors.
Grants 2 Soul Hearts and modifies drops from Champion monsters based on certain conditions.
texts.dlc8: Also modifies room clear drops.

texts.base: +0.35 tears up. Allows Isaac to fire tears diagonally.
The first enemy killed in a room explodes and poisons nearby enemies. Poisoned enemies will also explode upon death.
Spawns a finger familiar that points at enemies, dealing scaling damage.
Spawns a shadow familiar that follows Isaac's movements on a 1 second delay and deals contact damage to enemies. After dealing enough damage, it is absorbed by Isaac and spawns friendly Chargers.
Spawns a familiar that leaves a trail of creep that damages enemies at 6 damage per second. Has a chance to spawn damaging beams of light onto enemies that touch the cloud.
Spawns a Hush familiar that bounces diagonally around the room and deals contact damage. While firing tears, it stops moving.
Spawns a familiar that fires clusters of tears. Must be charged before shooting.
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and makes other familiars follow it. While firing tears, other familiars stop moving.
Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and charges across the room when Isaac fires, blocking shots and dealing 40.5 damage per second on contact.
Begins with no charges and turns into Glass Cannon when used. Only acquired by taking damage while holding Glass Cannon.
Grants a familiar that follows Isaac and blocks enemy shots.
Kills all enemies in the room, then kills Isaac three seconds later.
Duplicates a random pickup in the room.
texts.dlc8: The new pickup may be different than the original (i.e. a different card, etc).

texts.base: Consumes all pedestal items in the room. Active items will have their effects added to Void, and passive items will grant random stat upgrades.
Freezes all enemies until a fire button is pressed.
Consumes Isaac's currently held trinket and applies its effect permanently.
Doubles Isaac's Blue Flies and Blue Spiders, or spawns one if Isaac has none. Converts pickups in the current room into Blue Flies or Blue Spiders.
Displaces enemy sprites for the current room, randomly increases one stat and decreases another.
Transforms Isaac into a random character and removes the last item collected.
Damages all enemies and destroys all obstacles. The effect occurs every time a new room is entered for the rest of the floor. Opens the doors to the floor's Secret Rooms and Super Secret Rooms.

name: Wait What?
quote: I can't believe it's not butter bean!

texts.base: Isaac farts, sending out rock waves.
Spawns a penny and has a 50% chance to double all items and pickups in the room. If the effect fails, the items and pickups disappear.
Hurts Isaac without depleting health, activating any items that trigger upon taking damage.
Removes a Heart Container, increases damage and range, and grants a Cube of Meat.
Grants a random item effect for the current room.

texts.dlc7: Grants a random die item that changes each use.
texts.dlc8: Acts as any die item, and can by cycled by pressing the drop key.

texts.base: Spawns two item pedestals then is consumed. Begins with no charges.
Spawns a familiar that drops a random pill every 3 rooms. Upon using a pill, all enemies in the room are poisoned.
+1 luck. Spawns a fairy familiar that points out Secret Rooms, Crawl Space entrances, and tinted rocks.
Increases damage based on how many empty Red Heart containers Isaac has.
Tears fire sparks of electricity in random directions upon hitting an obstacle or enemy.

texts.dlc7: Gives a chance to shoot fires alongside tears that block enemy shots and deal damage to enemies that touch them.
texts.dlc8: Gives a chance to shoot blue fires alongside tears that become smaller as they travel.

texts.base: Adds a chance to fire needles that instantly kill basic enemies and deal triple damage to bosses. If a needle kills an enemy, it bursts into more tears/needles.
Isaac becomes camouflaged at the beginning of each room. Until he shoots, all non-boss enemies will be confused.
texts.dlc8: Isaac gains +0.5 Speed while camouflaged, and gains Tears and Damage upon breaking it.

texts.base: Whenever a Devil Room or Angel Room would spawn after defeating a boss, both rooms spawn. Only one can be entered.
An Angel Room door will always spawn after every boss fight, excluding the first floor and floors after Womb II/Utero II/Scarred Womb II.
Spawns a familiar that drops a Grab Bag every 5-6 rooms cleared.
Grants a Red Heart container for every 25 Coins Isaac has.
Adds a chance to fire a creep shot that deals double damage and leaves a trail of slowing white creep.

texts.dlc7: Adds a chance to fire a piercing tear that instantly kills any enemy that it touches.
texts.dlc8: Adds a chance to fire a tear that summons Big Horn's hand to crush the first enemy it hits, instantly killing monsters or greatly damaging bosses.

texts.base: Spawns a stationary fly turret that lasts for the current room and fires tears at nearby enemies.
Upon entering a room with enemies in it, has a chance to spawn a random friendly enemy that persists across rooms.
Isaac's tears deal double damage and inflict bleeding on enemies if they're facing away from Isaac.

texts.dlc7: Damages all enemies in the room. Has a chance to drop a Half Red Heart or Half Soul Heart if an enemy is hit.
texts.dlc8: Damages all enemies in the room. Has a chance to drop a Half Red Heart if an enemy is hit.

texts.base: Spawns an orbiting razor that deals contact damage and inflicts bleeding on enemies, causing them to slowly take damage over time.
Spawns an orbital familiar that deals 30 damage per second and fires a randomly angled tear every 2 seconds.
Spawns Delirium as a random friendly boss that fights for Isaac.
Spawns a fly familiar that orbits around a random enemy and deals 30 damage per second to enemies it comes in contact with.
Throws a black hole on the ground which sucks in and damages enemies.
+0.1 flat damage, grants a Soul Heart. Enemies can randomly become briefly charmed or feared. Taking damage has a chance to spawn a Rainbow Poop.
Enemies, enemy shots, tears, and pickups will briefly freeze in place at random intervals.
Upon use, spawns a random item from the current room's item pool, with a chance to spawn A Lump of Coal or The Poop instead.
Upon use, creates a stationary sprinkler that rotates and fires tears in 8 directions. The tears copy Isaac's stats and most tear effects.
+7 Bombs. Removes the delay between bomb placements, allowing them to be placed rapidly.
texts.dlc8: Bombs will no longer knock each other away.

texts.base: Spawns a familiar with a random tear effect. The familiar is randomized at the start of each floor.
Grants a familiar that transforms into another random familiar every 10 seconds.
Grants an active item charge every 15 enemies killed.
While held, guarantees one item in every Shop will be on sale. On use, makes a random item in the current room free.
Upon use, for the next three seconds, any enemy shots that come near Isaac are held in place and then later reflected.
If the box is empty, picks up items and pickups in a room and stores them. If the box is not empty, places all stored items and pickups in the current room.
texts.dlc8: Can carry up to 10 items or pickups at once.

texts.base: Connects Isaac's tears with electricity that can damage enemies.

Upon taking damage, grants a body part as an orbital, which blocks enemy shots and deals 7 damage per tick to enemies it comes in contact with. The orbitals will be destroyed if they take enough damage from enemies or enemy shots.
Spawns a random Harbinger familiar that changes every 10 seconds. Harbingers have different behaviors and spawn themed Locusts.
Summons a controllable ghost that can perform various tasks depending on what it targets.
Spawns an orbital familiar with a large orbital radius. Tears that pass through the prism split into four multi-colored tears.
Replaces Isaac's tears with eyeballs that can bounce off of each other. The eyeballs are not limited by range, and will instead dissipate when they stop moving or when hitting an enemy or obstacle.
Grants a pickup or stat upgrade if all enemies in a room are killed in the order they are marked.
Tears are now fired in an arc. Upon hitting the floor, an obstacle, or an enemy, they burst into many smaller tears in all directions. Increases tear delay.
Isaac's tears decelerate as they travel. Upon stopping or hitting an obstacle, they burst into 8 tears in all directions. Tears can be fired into other tears to feed them, increasing their damage.
Tears are replaced with piercing white blasts of light that deal less damage but can damage the same enemy multiple times.
Allows Isaac to hold two active items.
Grants one Soul Heart. Upon entering a boss room, grants a shield that blocks one hit, then disappears.
Sacrifices up to 2 familiars and spawns an item for each familiar sacrificed. Converts all friendly spiders and flies into coins.
Drops a random pill, and spawns a familiar that charges up and fires creep. Using pills changes the creep type.
Spawns 3 random trinkets. Taking damage has a 5% chance to swallow Isaac's currently held trinket, gaining its effect permanently.
Spawns an egg familiar, which cracks into a random friendly monster when Isaac is hurt. The egg regenerates upon entering a different room.
Tears bounce off the floor, creating splashes. Splashes deal 25% of Isaac's tear damage to all enemies in a small area.
Grants one Bone Heart and spawns three Red Hearts.
Spawns a bone familiar that circles around Isaac and reflects enemy shots.
Spawns a white poop familiar, which turns into a White Poop when Isaac is hurt. White poop has an aura that increases tear fire rate and can block enemy shots.
texts.dlc8: The aura also increases damage by 20% and gives homing.

texts.base: Spawns a bone familiar that hovers back and forth in front of Isaac, dealing damage equal to Isaac's damage.

texts.dlc7: Creates a friendly Bony, Black Bony, or an orbital bone for each enemy killed in the current room.
texts.dlc8: Creates a friendly Bony, Black Bony, Bone Fly, Revenant, or an orbital bone for each enemy killed in the current room.

texts.base: Creates a ring of light around Isaac that petrifies enemies in contact.
Grants one Bone Heart, +0.7 tears, spawns a Mysterious Paper.
Spawns a familiar that flies through the room while firing, dealing a flat 7 contact damage to enemies and retrieving pickups.
Replaces all Red Heart Containers with 6 empty Bone Hearts.
texts.dlc7: Upon losing a Bone Heart, Isaac fires bones in 8 directions and permanently gains a tears up.
texts.dlc8: Upon losing a Bone Heart, Isaac fires bones in 8 directions and permanently gains a fire rate up.

texts.base: While held, causes Mom to continuously attempt to stomp on Isaac. Activating makes her stop for the current room or wave. One of two parts necessary to create Mom's Shovel.
One of two parts necessary to create Mom's Shovel. No effect if somehow obtained on its own.
Creates a trapdoor that leads to the next floor upon activation. Unlocks The Forgotten when used on a mound of dirt that appears in Dark Room.
Gives Isaac the chance to fire spore tears that stick to enemies and blow up after a few seconds, dealing damage and poisoning nearby enemies and releasing more spores.
Enemies near Isaac are afflicted with fear.
Spends five Pennies to increase Isaac's damage by 1.2 for the current room.
Grants Brimstone for the current room.
Gives Isaac a fortune, Soul Heart, Card, Rune, or trinket, similar to a Fortune Telling Machine. Fortunes are much more likely to be given than anything else.
Causes Isaac to occasionally fire extra tears in random directions while shooting.
Repeatedly zaps enemies that are close to Isaac.
Releases a ring of tears and increases fire rate for the current room when Isaac takes damage.

name: Almond Milk
quote: DMG down + tears up + you feel nutty

texts.base: Quadruples fire rate, with x0.3 damage multiplier. Tears are given random worm trinket effects.
Locks Isaac's attributes to their highest values reached.
+5 Bombs. Each bomb gains 1-4 random bomb synergies.
Gives Isaac +0.5 Tears and +0.2 Shot Speed.
Spawns a familiar that chases enemies. After killing enough enemies, it becomes more powerful but will also try to hurt Isaac. Attacking it returns it to normal.
During the transition between floors, Isaac's nightmare shows the contents of the upcoming floor's Treasure Room, as well as the floor's boss. Grants a Half Soul Heart when entering a new floor.
Gives Isaac a familiar that grants +0.4 Fire Rate for each consecutive room he's cleared without taking damage. The bonus stacks up to five times.
Double tapping a fire key creates a shield that pushes away enemies and reflects enemy projectiles and lasers.
Stabs Isaac at the beginning of each floor, draining his Red Hearts. Increases damage and speed for the floor based on the amount drained.
Grants multicolored tears. Each color comes with a different status or tear effect.

name: Orphan Socks
quote: Speed up + your feet feel stronger

texts.base: Prevents creep and floor spikes from damaging Isaac. Also gives Isaac +0.3 speed and 2 Soul Hearts.

name: Eye of the Occult
quote: DMG up + range up + controlled tears

texts.base: +1 damage, +2 range, -0.16 shot speed. Isaac's tears can be controlled mid-flight with tear controls.
Adds one Red Heart Container and fully restores health. x1.2 damage multiplier. Isaac will occasionally fire extra tears that orbit around him.
Isaac gains an aura that deals damage to enemies inside it.
A familiar burrows in Isaac's head, firing 4 slowing tears. Upon taking damage, there's a chance it will burst out of Isaac's head, spawning blue spiders and chasing enemies for the current room.
Destroying poop spawns Dip Familiars that follow Isaac and damage enemies. Destroying different types of poop spawns different Dips with special effects.

name: Damocles
quote: A king's fortune... but at what cost?

texts.base: Spawns a sword above Isaac's head, which doubles all item pedestals. After Isaac takes damage, the sword can randomly fall at any point, instantly killing him.
Creates a large pool of yellow creep beneath Isaac.
Instead of tears, Isaac swings a sword. Charging does a spin attack and fires a projectile, and a projectile is sometimes fired with normal swings if Isaac has no empty Red Heart Containers.
Creates a Red Room adjacent to a viable wall, indicated by the outline of a door. These rooms have a 10% chance to be a special room.
Spawns a fly orbital familiar that chases and blocks enemy shots.

name: Wavy Cap
quote: Tears up. A mind changing experience!

texts.base: Increases fire rate, decreases speed, and distorts the screen. All effects become more pronounced with repeated use, and wear off by clearing rooms.
+5 Bombs. If Isaac is currently firing, placing a bomb will instead shoot a fast-moving, explosive rocket in the direction he's facing.
On use, spawns a destroyable orbiting wisp familiar that fires tears and deals contact damage. Also acts as a passive item that causes other active items to spawn themed wisps.
Spawns three Soul Hearts and two Angel Room items and is consumed. Starts with no charges, and can only be charged by picking up 6 Soul Hearts.

name: The Stairway
quote: May you get what you came for

texts.base: Generates a ladder at the start of every floor that leads to a unique Angel Room shop.
Reveals the location of the Boss Room. Upon defeating a boss, activates XIX - The Sun, fully recharges Isaac's active item, grants bonus damage and luck for the rest of the floor, and removes curses.

name: Luna
quote: The moon's blessing shines upon you

texts.base: Adds an extra Secret Room and Super Secret Room to each floor. Secret Rooms contain a beam of light that increases Fire Rate for the current floor and gives a Half Soul Heart.
+0.4 speed. Doors stay open after entering a room, even in rooms with enemies.
Adds one red Heart container. Heals 1 additional Red Heart. Enemies near Isaac become charmed.
+1 Damage. Replaces tears with rocks that deal variable damage, have increased knockback, and can destroy obstacles.
Dash by double-tapping the movement key, becoming invulnerable and damaging enemies. There's a short cooldown before Isaac can dash again.
+2 red Heart containers, -0.3 speed. Isaac builds speed while standing still, and releases poison gas clouds when he moves afterwards.
Upon entering a room, a circle of tears orbits Isaac. Enemy tears have a chance to be caught in orbit, turning them friendly.
Isaac shoots ice tears, which slow enemies and freeze monsters they kill. Frozen enemies slide away and explode into ice shards when touched.
Isaac's mouth fills with tears over time while not firing, up to a cap. Holding the fire button will release all stored tears in rapid succession.
+0.7 tears. Significantly shrinks Isaac, allowing him to squeeze between objects and makes some enemy shots pass over him.
Spawns an additional Curse Room on each floor. Curse Rooms have improved layouts.
Increases the fire rate in Isaac's left eye, causing his eyes to fire at different rates.
Increases tears and grants an Eternal Heart. Allows Angel Rooms to appear even if a Devil Deal has been taken before. Reduces the Devil/Angel room chance penalty for taking Red heart damage.
Adds a trapdoor to every Shop that leads to a second shop with a unique stock and marked-up prices.
Recharges Isaac's currently held active item and drops 2-4 batteries.
Lets Isaac pick up and throw rocks, TNT, Poops, friendly Dips, Bombs, and other obstacles.
Summons The Peeper for the current room, which leaves a trail of red creep.
Gives Isaac the chance to fire tears that create rifts where they land, which damage nearby enemies and pull in enemies, pickups, and tears/shots from all sources.
Gives Isaac a familiar that fires chaotic bursts of tears in all directions.
Spawns a shooting familiar that has a chance to petrify enemies, and freezes monsters upon killing them.
Rerolls all items in the room. Each item has a 25% chance to disappear instead.
The first time Isaac takes damage in a room, a familiar leaps on an enemy, dealing damage and releasing a rock wave. For the rest of the room, it chases enemies similar to Dead Bird.
Isaac shouts, damaging and pushing away nearby enemies. The shout gets stronger the more charges the item has. Can also be charged by taking damage.

Creates a ghostly familiar that closely follows behind Isaac. It dies in one hit, but respawns at the start of the next floor. Each time it survives until the next floor, it rewards Isaac with Soul Hearts, Eternal Hearts, or an Item.
Grants a Red Heart container and restores 5 hearts. Bombs leave behind damaging red creep. Isaac can place Bombs at the cost of half a heart if he doesn't have any.
Spawns a Dumpy familiar that pushes away nearby enemies and projectiles just before Isaac is about to be hit, then falls asleep. He can be awoken by walking to him.
Gives a chance to shoot fires alongside tears that block enemy shots and deal damage to enemies that touch them.
Gives Isaac the chance to fire tears that magnetize enemies they hit, causing them to attract nearby pickups and enemies, as well as tears/shots from all sources.
Adds a chance to fire tears that mark enemies with the Bait status effect. Enemies marked as bait are attacked by other enemies.
Grants a character-specific effect that enhances their special abilities.
Refills all heart containers. Grants an enormous damage boost that wears off over time.

Removes all of Isaac's items and pickups and takes him to a unique Bedroom with some pickups and Chests and a trapdoor to the next floor. For every item Isaac lost, he gets to take an item from a set of three.
Adds 5 Keys on pickup. Allows Isaac to throw his keys to deal damage to enemies, destroy obstacles, and open doors.
Drops 5 random cards.

Gigantifies Isaac for 30 seconds, increasing damage and range while lowering tears, granting invulnerability, and allowing Isaac to crush enemies and obstacles he walks on. The effect persists between rooms.
Combined with Knife Piece 2, creates a knife familiar that damages enemies and can open the door to the Corpse.
Combined with Knife Piece 1, creates a knife familiar that damages enemies and can open the door to the Corpse.
Takes Isaac to an abandoned and expanded version of Home, which has one copy of every item in the game. After taking an item, Isaac returns to the room he used Death Certificate in.
Spawns an orbiting fly familiar that fires shielded tears at incoming enemy projectiles.
Splits all enemies in the room into two smaller versions of themselves with much less health.
+2 luck. Provides immunity to burn, confusion, fear, and poison.

Grants flight, +2 damage, and increases speed to 1.1. Grants enough health to have 6 full hearts, if possible. Grants the Holy Mantle effect for the room it was obtained in. Automatically given to Isaac after defeating Dogma.
While in a room with enemies, spawns cracks on the ground. Walking over these cracks summons ghosts that launch themselves at enemies and explode.
Passively spawns a familiar that moves in the direction Isaac shoots. On use, Isaac swaps places with the familiar.
Brings Isaac back to the first floor of a new run, retaining all of his items.
Adds a chance to shoot a fist tear that has extremely high knockback and confuses enemies.
Throws an eraser that instantly kills the first monster it hits, and prevents that monster from spawning for the rest of the run. Can only be used once per floor.
Gives Isaac a Rotten Heart.
Spews a stream of damaging flame. Gains Soul Charges each time an enemy dies, which are used to fuel the urn.
While in an uncleared room, Isaac forms a trail of bloody tears that drags behind him, bursting and dealing damage upon contact with enemies.

Consumes one heart container or two Soul Hearts to spawn an item and give Isaac a broken heart container that can never be filled. If Magic Skin isn't being held after being used, it is very likely to replace any future items.
Grants flight and two Soul Hearts. In addition to tears, Isaac can charge up and fire a powerful holy laser.
Increases Isaac's lowest stat and drops either 3 Coins, 1 Bomb, or 1 Key depending on what Isaac has the least of.
Gives Isaac a Teratoma orbital that blocks shots, deals contact damage, and splits into smaller versions of itself upon taking damage. The smaller versions break into blue spiders.
+5 Bombs. Bombs fire four Brimstone lasers in the cardinal directions upon exploding.

name: 4.5 Volt
quote: Beat the juice out of them!

texts.base: Active items don't charge when clearing rooms. Instead, they're charged by dealing damage to enemies.
Gives Isaac a miniature Baby Plum familiar that propels itself diagonally around the room, firing tears behind itself as it travels.
Summons the boss Baby Plum to fight for Isaac in the current room.
Spawns a star familiar that slowly travels towards the Boss Room, giving an aura that increases damage and tears and grants homing tears.
Spawns an ice cube familiar that slides around when walked into. It slows and deals contact damage, freezing monsters it kills.

While held, enemies leave behind ghosts on death. Stronger enemies leave bigger ghosts. Using the item causes the ghosts to explode and damage nearby enemies, and instantly kills all ghost enemies with less than 50% HP.
Converts good pills into bad pills and identifies all pills. Bad pills now have secondary positive effects. Grants one Black Heart.

When used, gives Isaac +0.5 speed and greatly increases the rotation speed of Isaac's orbitals for 3 seconds. Gives Isaac a spinning top orbital that blocks enemy shots and deals contact damage to enemies while held.
Enemies explode into tears upon death, which inherit the effects of Isaac's tears.
Causes Isaac to spawn micro-Isaacs when he takes damage, which chase and shoot at nearby enemies.
+2.5 Range, Increases tear size.
Spawns two portals at the beginning of each floor that each lead to either the Boss Room, Treasure Room, or Secret Room.
The first five enemies killed in a room will spawn stationary shooting familiars where they died.
Isaac periodically turns into a spiked statue, briefly becoming invulnerable and dealing contact damage.
+1 Red Heart Container and fully heals Isaac. Item pedestals also offer a random food item. Picking up a food item temporarily grants +3.6 damage and permanently boosts 2 stats.
Shows the contents of Chests, Fire Places, Grab Bags, and Shopkeepers before they're opened/destroyed.
Spawns a controllable Keeper to fight enemies alongside Isaac, functioning similarly to Jacob and Esau. If Keeper dies, he spawns 5 blue spiders and Strawman is removed from Isaac's inventory.
Sends Isaac on an Ascent toward Home.

Adds a Red Heart Container, fully heals Isaac, and gives +0.2 Speed, +0.5 Damage, +0.5 Tears, +2.5 Range, +0.2 Shot Speed, and +1.0 Luck. Increases the chance of encountering a Devil Room, Angel Room, and/or Planetarium each by 6.9%.
If a room gives a reward when cleared, there will be two different rewards to chose from. Taking one causes the other to disappear.
Gives Isaac a permanent stat boost whenever he heals with Red Heart pickups.
Devil deals now cost Coins, Shop items now cost health, and consumables in shops are free but surrounded by spikes.
If Isaac enters a Devil Room, but leaves without taking/opening anything in it (including Black Hearts, etc.), he gets +1 Damage and a Soul Heart at the start of the next floor.

On death, Isaac's ghost is chained to his dead body and he can continue to fight with 1/2 of a heart, returning to life after 10 seconds. After it activates, it must be recharged by picking up a Soul Heart.
Unlocks doors and reveals a random room on the map when Isaac takes damage.
If Isaac has one red heart or fewer at the beginning of a floor, he gains an empty red heart container.
Causes Isaac to turn into a ghost if he gets hit while in an uncleared room, giving him flight and spectral tears and blocking the next hit he takes.
Replaces tears with fetuses that chase down enemies and deal contact damage. Each shot requires a brief charge up.
Spawns a familiar that charges a miniature Maw of the Void attack while Isaac shoots.
While firing, Isaac charges up a short-ranged Brimstone-like diarrhea beam that shoots behind him.
A familiar that flies forward, consuming pickups in its path. Each one will increase its size and damage and spawn a Blue Fly. Every four pickups, it opens a portal that leads to an unexplored room.
Gives Isaac a Nerve Ending familiar that burrows out of the ground to grab and deal damage to enemies over time.
Enemies spawn floating bones on death, which block shots and damage/repel enemies that touch them.
Enemies have a chance to spawn ghosts on death, which chase and deal contact damage to enemies and explode after a short time.
Spawns random wisps that shoot various tears, block shots, and deal contact damage. The number of wisps spawned increases every time the jar is used.
Gives Isaac a permanent stat boost whenever he picks up a Soul Heart.
Spawns a random friendly monster that mimics Isaac's movements and attacks.
Upon death, Isaac respawns in the current room with half of a Red Heart, a massive size down, and +0.2 Speed.
Item pedestals cycle between 5 random items before being picked up.
Causes enemies to bounce off of Isaac, dealing damage to them if they hit an enemy or obstacle. Also gives Isaac the chance to deflect enemy shots.
Prevents items of quality 0-1 from appearing, and items of quality 2 from appearing 33% of the time, greatly increasing the quality of items received from all item pools. Quest items are unaffected.
Spawns a special set of spikes in the Devil Room. Taking damage from the spikes has a chance to grant a reward.
Spawns eight orbital flies, which turn into Blue Flies after they block a shot. Each time a room is cleared, spawns another orbital fly.
Grants 3 broken hearts and +0.25 damage for every broken heart Isaac has. Every otherwise fatal hit will add 2 more until Isaac has nothing but broken hearts.
The first 6 times Isaac takes damage on a given floor, he gains Speed and Fire Rate for the rest of the floor, up to a maximum of +1.02 and +3.00, respectively.
Gives Isaac a halo that summons beams of light on enemies inside it. The halo grows larger the more times Isaac has taken damage this floor.
Spawns a familiar that becomes a clone of the floor's boss when entering the Boss Room. Defeating it drops an extra item.
Spawns two familiars that float on either side of Isaac and fire tears that use his tears, range, shot speed, and tear effects, and scale with damage.
Isaac builds rage every time a room is cleared. After four rooms, fires a large Brimstone laser when entering the next room.

name: Echo Chamber
quote: I can see see the future future future

texts.base: When Isaac uses a Card, Pill, or Rune, he also uses a copy of the previous three Cards/Pills/Runes he used after picking up Echo Chamber.
Spawns an Old Chest at the start of each floor.
After taking damage, spawns an orbital wisp that lasts for the entire floor, up to a maximum of six. They fire tears but do not block shots.
Swaps between the current character and Esau Jr., who has +2 flat damage and flight. Characters have independent items and health. Dying as either character ends the run.

Causes Isaac to go berserk for 5 seconds, greatly increasing his speed, tears, and damage, but restricting him to using a melee weapon instead of his tears. This item charges by dealing damage to enemies instead of clearing rooms.
Briefly grants +1 speed and makes Isaac invulnerable and intangible. When the effect ends, destroys all projectiles and damages all enemies Isaac ran through.
Destroys all items in the room and gives Isaac a unique locust familiar for each item destroyed. Some items generate locusts with special effects.
Grants one full Red Heart container. Heals 1 additional Red Heart.
+1 Damage. Prevents Isaac from firing tears from his left eye, like Cain.
Isaac dashes forward and picks up the first enemy hit. After a moment, he slams them into the ground to deal damage and create a circular rock wave.
Collects and holds up to 8 pickups, which can then be used to craft an item. The power level of the item is based on the quality of pickups used.

Item pedestals have a second uninteractable "ghostly" item behind them. Activating will flip the real and ghostly items around. If playing as Tainted Lazarus, also flips between them and Dead Tainted Lazarus.

Spawns a wisp representing a random passive item, which orbits Isaac but can be destroyed. While the wisp is alive, Isaac gains that item's effects. Generation uses the current room's item pool 25% of the time, otherwise a random pool.

Removes half a heart and creates a Clot familiar that mimics Isaac's movements and tear effects. As Tainted Eve, passively converts health into Clots while firing. Activating returns all Clots to health.
Retrieves the Forgotten's body from any distance. Only available as the Birthright effect for Tainted Forgotten.
Exclusive to Tainted ???. Allows him to save one poop bomb for later, allowing him to gather more over time.
Gives range, speed, or damage when buying things from a shop. Also spawns three coins and a Key on pickup.
Rocks and other Obstacles spawn blue spiders over time while in a room with enemies, and spawn two blue spiders when destroyed.
Spawns a random shop item or pickup which can be bought for its normal price.
Spawns certain pickups based on how many charges it has. If fully charged, instead has one of many unique effects.

name: TMTRAINER
quote: ZZaZZ ZZdZZiZZmZZhZZ ZZvZZ ZZoZZ ZZ ZZsZZlZZhZZsZZoZZaZZiZZ

texts.base: Causes all future items to be "glitched", granting them completely random effects.
Chains down the nearest enemy for 5 seconds, preventing them from acting.
Transforms all items in the room by decreasing their internal ID number.
After Isaac takes damage from an enemy or donates health, launches Red Hearts from Isaac that despawn after 1.5 seconds.
Causes Isaac to throw poop, create buffing creep, or drop bombs while fighting enemies.
Double-tapping a fire button causes Isaac to sneeze blood, dealing damage to enemies in front of him. Affected enemies are cursed and take more damage from Brimstone-like attacks.
+5 Bombs. Bombs become spectral and spawn ghosts that deal contact damage to enemies and explode after 10 seconds.
Spawns a demon familiar that's attached to Isaac and moves and fires in the direction Isaac shoots, using Isaac's damage, tears, range, shot speed, and special tear effects.
Throws Isaac's head, which is still able to fire tears at the spot it lands. Reactivating the item or stepping on the head reattaches it.
+0.75 damage, +1 luck.
Tears fired from Isaac's right eye have +28% Damage, +6.5 Range, and -0.3 Shot Speed.
+1 Damage. Drops a random Rune or Soul Stone upon pickup.
